lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: G’morning!

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: I’m growing to like this establishment of yours, I think I will be popping in more often!

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: Please get me something sweet and floral this time. I’m feeling fancy today.

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: Nah, chief, this isn’t gonna cut it. Make this tea properly, would you?

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: If you need a reminder - I want something sweet and floral. Thanks!

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: Oh yeah, that’s exactly what I had in mind! It tastes so lovely.

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: Now this is what rustles my jimmies! I knew you could do it.

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: I need to tell you something. I might have not been exactly upfront with you.

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: I’ve come here because I thought I was going to see Willow. I know she likes this place, she mentioned it to me a while ago.

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: Has she been here today?

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: That’s… kinda worrying. I thought I could check up on her, see how she is doing.

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: Do you know by any chance where she might be?

options.line: Yeah, actually. She’s at a party.

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: She’s at a WHAT?

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: No way. I don’t believe you. That’s not like her.

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: Do you have any idea how bad of an idea this is?

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: She’s, like, deathly afraid of large groups of people! It’s not gonna be a fun experience for her at all!

options.line: Oh, I kind of get that.
YBut she seemed excited about it…

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: Yeah, exactly! You get what I mean!

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: No way. Her, being excited at the prospect of long hours of enduring this party? That can’t be right!

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: I must be missing something. Why would she willingly go out there and experience something she knows well she won’t enjoy?

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: ... Could it be…

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: … That she wants to face that fear?

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: Oh, that actually makes a lot of sense.

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: Dang, it hasn’t even been a full week and she’s already growing as a person.

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: That’s actually quite admirable, don’t you think?

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: But still, I’m worried that this is a bad time to do that, and a bad way to go about it.

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: Did she tell you where the party is happening? I want to make sure she’s doing okay.

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: I won’t be dragging her out as soon as I get there! I promise!

options.line: I don’t really know if I can tell you.
Yeah, it’s in the Parkway Avenue 97.

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: That’s… understandable. I would have been intruding into her life too much, especially when she was clear she doesn’t want me there anymore.

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: But I still feel like this is the right thing to do. I will find her, and be for her, regardless.

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: Oh. That’s a bummer.

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: But it doesn't matter, really. I want to be there for her, and I will find her. Feels like the right thing to do.

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: It’s at Mincy’s place? That’s great to hear, actually. I know her, and a couple of her friends.

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: I’m gonna go and ask them to go nicely on Willow. Thanks a bunch for letting me know.

lines.name: Paisley
lines.line: So, I will be heading off now. Have a good day!
